pharma.title: Class 2 Medicines Recall: Mercury Pharmaceuticals Ltd, Paliperidone Mercury Pharma prolonged-release suspension for injection in pre-filled syringes, EL(26)A/01
pharma.source: Alerts, recalls and safety information: medicines and medical devices
pharma.summary: Mercury Pharmaceuticals Ltd is recalling remaining stock of paliperidone pre-filled syringes as a precautionary measure due to Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP) deficiencies cited during a recent inspection at the finished pâ€¦
